mapper.select: select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, name, space_id, type, ip, port from sys_device where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_device( id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, name, space_id, type, ip, port) values (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser}, #{name}, #{spaceId}, #{type}, #{ip}, #{port})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_device where delete_flag = 0
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
